name: Dopium
description: Dopium, a cross between ChemDawg and Sour Diesel, has a unique scent while keeping elements of that classic Sour Diesel smell. Described as delivering relaxing and mellow effects, Dopium has the sharp spice of diesel with floral hints.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Focused, Energetic, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Pain, Nausea, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy, Paranoid
